description.raw:
The original work has been done by @seanyen-msft at [https://bitbucket.org/seanyen-msft/gazebo/branches/compare/gazebo9\_9.5.0\_windows gazebo9\_9.5.0#diff](https://bitbucket.org/seanyen-msft/gazebo/branches/compare/gazebo9_9.5.0_windows%0Dgazebo9_9.5.0#diff). I’ve imported the patches and made a bit of cleanup on the configure.bat script and add the conditional on one of the ogre changes.

These changes requires the following PR in release-tools:

[https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/722/upgrade-windows-dependencies-for-gazebo/diff#chg-jenkins-scripts/lib/ign\_transport-base-windows.bat](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/722/upgrade-windows-dependencies-for-gazebo/diff#chg-jenkins-scripts/lib/ign_transport-base-windows.bat)

Tested:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=2431)
https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/2431/

Thanks @seanyen-msft for fixing the build.
